title: Hello | DePaul University, Chicago | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Life at DePaul Doesn't Stand Still Life at DePaul Doesn't Stand Still Your Future Begins Here DePaul. It’s a school in Chicago. Here, you’re not just attending classes in the city—you’re part of it! Here, you can study in the library—or at the beach. See a play at our Theatre School—or in the Downtown Theatre District. Get hands-on experience in one of our labs—or at an internship with a Fortune 500 company. Here, we have the NCAAandthe NBA, dining hallsanddeep dish, jazz studiesandjazz clubs.Because here, we have it all. Let's Stay Connected Fill out our form to receive info about our undergraduate majors and what it's like to be a DePaul student. STUDENTS. SELFIES. SNAPS. SIGHTS. Follow@iamdepaul, our student-run Instagram account featuring a different DePaul student each week. Like Molly, a health sciences major who studied pediatric cancer at her summer fellowship. And Jesse, a finance major who served as the executive director for DePaul’s 24-hour-dance marathon that raises funds for patients and their families at the Ann and Robert H. Lurie Children's Hospital. And Carlos, a political science major who saw "Hamilton" at the CIBC Theatre. And Yamini, a management information systems major who studied abroad in Paris.
